#include<vector>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include <fstream>
#include<iomanip>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstdio>
#include<stack>
#include<cstring>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include<queue>  
using namespace std;
string s1,s2;
string s3;
int main()
{
	std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
	int T;
	int i,n1,n2;
	int c;
	int t;
	cin>>T;
	while(T--)
	{
		c=0;
		cin>>s1>>s2;
		reverse(s1.begin(),s1.end());
		reverse(s2.begin(),s2.end());
		n1=s1.size();
		n2=s2.size();
		s3="";
		for(i=0;i<n1||i<n2;i++)
		{
			t=c;
			if(i<n1)
				t+=s1[i]-'A';
			if(i<n2)
				t+=s2[i]-'A';
			if(t>25)
			{
				t-=26;
				c=1;
			}
			else
				c=0;
			s3+='A'+t;
		}
		if(c)
			s3+='A'+c;
		reverse(s3.begin(),s3.end());
		cout<<s3<<endl;
	}
	//system("pause");
	return 0;
}
